about_the_game:
You play as the master of a Guild of Mercenaries, attracting an array of unscrupulous individuals from the four corners of the realm.

Using the straightforward but powerful booster-based deck editor, quickly define both the cards and the power-ups each mercenary brings to a scenario.

Playing solo or co-op with up to 2 friends, in each Scenario, your team will face a formidable bestiary of deadly denizens in varied combat encounters, all set in a fantasy world, inspired by Renaissance Italy.

Each Mercenary will not only have unique gameplay but also have personalities that must be managed. The actions of one Mercenary may impact their relationship with another, gaining powerful bonuses or challenging debuffs that persist between scenarios.

Scenarios are fully replayable, with more loot available to the best players. Daily events will mix things up with defined load-outs to keep you on your toes.

short_description: Ironmarked is a 1 to 3 player co-op RPG with turn-based combat, set in a medieval fantasy world inspired by Renaissance Italy. Select your band of deadly mercenaries to take on perilous quests from the local factions, just remember the most important rule… get paid!
